⚠️ **This is the `develop` branch**

- Unstable
- APIs may change without notice
- Not intended for production use


## Branch Purpose

The `develop` branch is the **primary integration branch** for all ongoing skeleton development.

It is used to:
- Evolve the project structure
- Introduce new bootstrap patterns
- Prepare upcoming skeleton releases
- Validate integration concepts with FireHub Core

All **release branches** are created **from `develop`**.

## Stability Guarantee

❌ No backward compatibility guarantee  
❌ Folder structure may change  
❌ Bootstrap APIs may change  
❌ Breaking changes are expected

This branch is intended **only for contributors and advanced users experimenting with FireHub**.

## Versioning Strategy

FireHub follows **Semantic Versioning (SemVer)**:

MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH

### Important notes

- Skeleton versioning is **independent** from FireHub Core versioning
- Compatibility is documented, not enforced via SemVer
- Until `v1.0.0`, all versions are considered unstable

### Pre-release versions

Pre-release versions are tagged **only on release branches**, never directly on `develop`.

Examples:
- `v0.1.0-alpha.1`
- `v0.1.0-beta.1`
- `v0.1.0-rc.1`

The `develop` branch itself is considered **pre-release by definition**.

## Branch Workflow

### Main branches

| Branch          | Purpose                                 |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|
| `master`        | Production-ready, stable releases only  |
| `develop`       | Active development & integration        |
| `release/x.y.z` | Release preparation & stabilization     |
| `vX.y.z`        | Maintenance branches for older versions |

### Supporting branches

| Branch          | Purpose                           |
|-----------------|-----------------------------------|
| `feature/*`     | New features                      |
| `bugfix/*`      | Bug fixes                         |
| `patch/*`       | Patch                             |
| `hotfix/*`      | Critical fixes for production     |
| `experiment/*`  | Prototypes and experiments        |
| `feature/*`     | Feature branch                    |
| `integration/*` | Temp branch for multiple features |
| `wip/*`         | Temporary work-in-progress        |

## Merging rules

- bugfix/* → develop
- patch/* → develop
- hotfix/* → master → develop -> vX.y.z
- experiment/* → develop (only if promoted)
- feature/* → develop
- integration/* → develop
- release/* → master (stable only)

❌ Direct commits to develop are discouraged  
✅ Pull requests with review are required
